Well if he says he has powers that kill characters in one hit, then I won't
accept anything but the damage I think is right. And furthermore, Logo
Morph, I like you and such, but your character Spitfire is moding, if he
bites them it kills them and if he spits venom in their eyes they are
blinded forever? Afraid I can only post normal damage for that, because my
characters need to be operational and with sight, so I can't afford to have
my characters blinded or killed, sorry...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 21, 2000 11:38 AM
Subject: Read, about TM4 Driver


>
>     Shomin, you brought in a TM3 driver, didn't ya?  And evidently it's
> either destroyed or your characters can't get to it.  So you bring in a
TM4
> driver?  Excuse me if I scoff a little!
>     This is getting ridiculous, and out of hand.  First the magical
driver,
> then the magical speaking with the Matrix and Oracle and such, and now
this
> crap.  Believe me, I'm not going to let that driver be legal.  Your
> characters finding all the super powerful stuff, is not fair.  And having
> them just appear, is also unfair.
